name: Classic Pancakes
description: Delicious and fluffy pancakes that are perfect for breakfast.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix together the dry ingredients.
In another bowl, beat the eggs into the milk, then stir in the melted butter.
Combine the wet and dry ingredients to make a batter.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat.
Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake.
Brown on both sides and serve hot.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with pancetta, eggs, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Fry the pancetta until it is crispy.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated parmesan cheese.
Combine the spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and healthy stir fry with mixed vegetables and a savory sauce.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, snap peas)
instructions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Mix the soy sauce, oyster sauce, cornstarch, and water in a bowl.
Pour over the vegetables and cook until the sauce has thickened.
Serve with rice.
